Title: 910 - Collaboration with Other FoundryBlazor Clients
Tip: Create a simple visual test that is your collaboration goal. This is mine!

Summary.What: The best collaboration demo is two different users pulling on two blocks and the connecting arrow stretches.
Summary.Why: Easy way to test achieving challenging goals.
Summary.How: Two people changing the size and position of a 1D glued shape indirectly by moving other shapes is excellent test.
